greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Continued fraction for cosh(gamma).
comment: Continued fraction of (exp(gamma)+exp(-gamma))/2 = cosh(gamma) (A147708), where gamma is the Euler-Mascheroni constant (A001620).
See A322603 for the continued fraction of sinh(gamma).
xref: Cf. A147708 (decimal expansion), A001620 (Euler-Mascheroni constant), A322603.
results.author: _Tristan Cam_, Dec 20 2018
